name: Planet Protector
description:
Welcome to Planet Protector!

Play as a young Starship Commander as you protect (or betray) Earth from waves of incoming hazards, such as Asteroids, Comets, and Satellites! Each hazard has it's own unique way of acting, so watch out!

A Commander, it is your goal to make sure no harm comes to Earth. Should the Earth take too many hits from space debris... it seems like the lives of all of humanity and yourself will come to an end.

However, not all is lost! Unlock and brave three different special endings! Will humanity survive, or will you bring all life on Planet Earth to an end...?

Find out in Planet Protector!
